author: Special Correspondent
text:
About 83 lakh persons, including 2.28 lakh engineers and 3.82 lakh graduate teachers, are waiting in the rolls of employment exchanges across the State, hoping to get a government job, according to the latest figures.

Matriculates constitute the major chunk of those waiting with over 59 lakh, followed by Class 12 pass (HSC/PUC) under the below graduates category.

There are over 2.19 lakh engineering post graduates, 2.67 lakh post-graduate teachers and 1.13 post-graduates in Science, as on December 31 last year.

About half of the persons waiting in the rolls are women.
title: 83 lakh waiting in employment exchange rolls
